MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont AddFont(bool obfuscate) cil managed
Public Function AddFont (obfuscate As Boolean) As XpsFont

param.name: obfuscate
param.span: 如果字型要模糊化，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to obfuscate the font; otherwise, .

summary.span: 將新的模糊化 加入至目前頁面。

span.span: Adds a new obfuscated to the current page.
The new font resource that was added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入新與文件封裝的選擇性模糊化，並關聯目前。 adds a new with optional obfuscation to the document package and associates it with the current . 設定`obfuscate`參數來`true`時義務混淆授權的專屬字型。Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font. 雖然模糊化未加密的字型，它會禁止解壓縮專屬的字型和其他用途的個別安裝。While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses. 如需有關模糊化字型的詳細資訊，請參閱 2.1.7.3"內嵌字型模糊化 」 中*XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以新增至網頁的字型資源。The following example shows how to use the method in order to add a font resource to a page. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

span.span: has been called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入新選用的模糊化或限制文件套件，並將它與目前。 adds a new with optional obfuscation or restrictions to the document package, and associates it with the current . 設定`obfuscate`參數來`true`時義務混淆授權的專屬字型。Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font. 雖然模糊化未加密的字型，它會禁止解壓縮專屬的字型和其他用途的個別安裝。While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses. 如需字型模糊化和受限制的字型使用的詳細資訊，請參閱*XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about font obfuscation and the use of restricted fonts see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以新增至網頁的字型資源。The following example shows how to use the method to add a font resource to a page.
